homepage.title: Dreamto – Shaping Your Digital Future
homepage.description: A leading tech agency crafting web, mobile, and cloud solutions for your ambitions. Discover our services and start your journey to digital excellence.
homepage.fromIdeaContent: We turn your bold ideas into unique digital products that attract customers and drive your business forward. By combining creativity and technology, we deliver innovative products that achieve tangible results.
homepage.fromIdeaButton: Start Your Journey with Us Today!
homepage.discoverTitle1: Don't wait for perfection. Taking action is the most important step
homepage.discoverTitle2: Even if your start is humble, experience will teach you a lot
homepage.discoverTitle3: Don't let fear hold you back! Start your journey today and get a free guide for the first steps.
homepage.discoverContent:
Example: If you want to write a book,
don't wait for perfect inspiration,
start by writing one page a day.
homepage.discoverButton: Start Your Success Journey for Free
homepage.subHeader: Transform Your Ideas into Reality with the Latest Technologies
homepage.subHeader2: Bring your dream to life in the digital world. We build a website and application that reflect your ambition clearly. Attract your audience and achieve your goals - that's our mission.
homepage.discoverDilog: You may face challenges, but resilience is the key to overcoming them.
homepage.discoverDilog1: Keep trying and learn from every failure.

meta.title: Privacy Policy | DreamToApp IT Solutions
meta.description: Learn how DreamToApp collects, uses, and protects your personal information. Our comprehensive privacy policy ensures your data security and privacy rights.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: DreamToApp IT Agency ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, use our services, or interact with us.
introduction.paragraph2: By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. We are committed to transparency and will always inform you about how we handle your data.

personalData.title: Personal Information
personalData.description: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:

technicalData.title: Technical Information
technicalData.description: We automatically collect certain technical information when you visit our website:

usageData.title: Usage Information
usageData.description: We collect information about how you interact with our website:

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use the collected information for the following purposes:

purposes.communication: To communicate with you about our services and respond to your inquiries
purposes.services: To provide and improve our services
purposes.improvement: To analyze website usage and improve user experience
purposes.security: To ensure the security and integrity of our services
purposes.legal: To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights
purposes.marketing: To send you relevant marketing communications (with your consent)

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:

thirdParties.title: Service Providers
thirdParties.description: We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in:

items.service: Providing our services and maintaining our website

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.description: We may disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights, property, or safety.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information:

measures.encryption: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
measures.training: Employee training on data protection practices

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

rights.accessDesc: Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you
rights.correctionDesc: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
rights.deletionDesc: Request deletion of your personal information
rights.portabilityDesc: Request transfer of your data to another service provider
rights.objectionDesc: Object to processing of your personal information

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to deliver relevant advertisements and track marketing campaigns.

cookies.management: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie consent tool.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.description: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.description: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data.

changesToPolicy.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changesToPolicy.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
contactInformation.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

dataProtectionOfficer.title: Data Protection Officer
dataProtectionOfficer.description: For privacy-related inquiries, you may also contact our Data Protection Officer:

privacy.footer: This Privacy Policy is effective as of the date stated above and applies to all users of our services.

meta.title: Terms of Service | DreamToApp IT Solutions
meta.description: Read our comprehensive Terms of Service for DreamToApp IT Agency. Understand your rights, obligations, and our service terms for web development and digital solutions.

terms.title: Terms of Service

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: Welcome to DreamToApp IT Agency. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
introduction.paragraph2: DreamToApp IT Agency ('we', 'our', or 'us') provides web development, mobile application development, and digital solutions services. These Terms apply to all users, clients, and visitors of our website and services.
introduction.paragraph3: Please read these Terms carefully before using our services. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, you should not use our services.

terms.companyDesc: Refers to DreamToApp IT Agency, its employees, agents, and representatives.
terms.clientDesc: Any individual or entity that uses our services or enters into a service agreement with us.
terms.servicesDesc: All services provided by DreamToApp IT Agency, including but not limited to web development, mobile app development, and consulting services.
terms.websiteDesc: The DreamToApp website located at dreamto.app and all associated pages and content.
terms.contentDesc: All text, images, graphics, software, and other materials available on our website or provided through our services.

services.title: Services
services.description: DreamToApp IT Agency provides the following services:

types.mobile: Mobile application development for iOS and Android
types.maintenance: Website and application maintenance and support

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By using our services, you acknowledge and agree that:

conditions.use: You have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms
conditions.legal: You have the legal capacity to enter into these Terms
conditions.age: You are at least 18 years old or have parental consent
conditions.capacity: You have the authority to bind your organization to these Terms

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: As a user of our services, you agree to:

obligations.compliance: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
obligations.security: Maintain the security of your account and information
obligations.legal: Use our services only for lawful purposes
obligations.cooperation: Cooperate with us in providing services
obligations.payment: Pay all fees and charges in a timely manner

ourRights.title: Our Intellectual Property
ourRights.description: All content, trademarks, logos, and intellectual property on our website and in our services are owned by DreamToApp IT Agency or our licensors.

yourRights.title: Your Intellectual Property
yourRights.description: You retain ownership of any content or materials you provide to us. You grant us a license to use such content for the purpose of providing our services.

licensing.title: License to Use
licensing.description: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use our website and services for their intended purpose.

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms
paymentTerms.description: Payment terms and conditions for our services:

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: All prices are quoted in Saudi Riyals (SAR) unless otherwise specified. Prices are subject to change with prior notice.

payment.title: Payment Methods
payment.description: We accept various payment methods including bank transfers, credit cards, and digital payments. Payment terms will be specified in individual service agreements.

latePayment.title: Late Payment
latePayment.description: Late payments may result in suspension of services and additional charges. Interest may be charged on overdue amounts.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.description: Refund policies vary by service and will be specified in individual service agreements. Generally, refunds are not provided for completed work.

timeline.title: Project Timeline
timeline.description: Project timelines will be agreed upon in writing before work begins. Delays may occur due to client feedback, changes in requirements, or unforeseen circumstances.

changes.title: Change Requests
changes.description: Changes to project scope may result in additional costs and timeline adjustments. All changes must be approved in writing.

approval.title: Client Approval
approval.description: Client approval is required at key project milestones. Delays in approval may affect project timeline and delivery.

deliverables.title: Deliverables
deliverables.description: Project deliverables will be specified in individual service agreements. We will provide all agreed-upon deliverables upon project completion.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: We are committed to maintaining the confidentiality of your information:

obligations.nonDisclosure: We will not disclose your confidential information to third parties without your consent
obligations.security: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information
obligations.limitedAccess: Access to your information is limited to authorized personnel only
obligations.return: We will return or destroy confidential information upon request

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, DreamToApp IT Agency shall not be liable for:

exclusions.damages: Indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages
exclusions.thirdParty: Damages caused by third-party services or products
exclusions.forceMajeure: Damages caused by events beyond our reasonable control
exclusions.unauthorized: Damages caused by unauthorized use or modification of our services

byClient.title: Termination by Client
byClient.description: You may terminate our services at any time with written notice. Early termination may result in additional charges.

byCompany.title: Termination by Company
byCompany.description: We may terminate services for breach of these Terms, non-payment, or other valid reasons with written notice.

effects.title: Effects of Termination
effects.description: Upon termination, you will lose access to our services, and we may delete your data in accordance with our data retention policies.

disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.description: We are committed to resolving disputes amicably:

negotiation.title: Negotiation
negotiation.description: Parties agree to attempt to resolve disputes through good faith negotiation before pursuing other remedies.

mediation.title: Mediation
mediation.description: If negotiation fails, parties may agree to mediation with a neutral third party.

arbitration.title: Arbitration
arbitration.description: Any disputes not resolved through negotiation or mediation shall be resolved through binding arbitration in Saudi Arabia.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

severability.title: Severability
severability.description: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect.

entireAgreement.title: Entire Agreement
entireAgreement.description: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and DreamToApp IT Agency regarding the use of our services.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
contactInformation.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:

terms.footer: These Terms of Service are effective as of the date stated above and apply to all users of our services.

footer.readyToTransform: Are you ready to turn your idea into reality?

services.tecnoUsed: Innovative technologies that meet your needs
services.blendingCreativity: We combine creativity and technology to provide customized solutions for your business.
services.heroBadge: Innovative Technologies That Meet Your Needs
services.heroDescription: We combine creativity and technology to provide customized solutions for your business. Building tomorrow's solutions with innovative technologies that meet your needs.
services.websiteDevelopmentDescription: We turn your ideas into exceptional websites that impress visitors and engage them with your brand. Our websites are not only visually appealing but also designed to be fast and responsive, ensuring a pleasant and comfortable user experience that converts visitors into loyal customers.
services.mobileAppDevelopmentDescription: We create innovative and user-friendly applications that allow your clients to access your services easily anytime and anywhere. Whether you need business or entertainment applications, we ensure a distinctive design filled with features that increase customer engagement with your brand.
services.crmDevelopmentDescription: We provide advanced systems for managing customer relationships, helping you organize their data, track their needs, and deliver personalized services that enhance their loyalty. With our smart tools, you can provide an ideal customer experience and increase their loyalty in the long run.
services.ecommerceDevelopmentDescription: We build a complete online store that reflects your brand identity and facilitates the buying and selling process. We offer modern designs, secure payment gateways, and a unique shopping experience that helps you increase your sales and reach a wider audience.
services.uiUxDesignDescription: We provide innovative modern designs that focus on user experience, making every interaction with your website or application enjoyable and seamless. We study customer behavior to deliver designs that meet their needs and enhance their connection with your services.
services.digitalMarketingDescription: We position your brand at the forefront of competition through integrated marketing strategies. We use the latest methods such as paid advertising and search engine optimization to ensure your brand reaches the right audience and achieves tangible results.
services.visualIdentityDescription: We create a unique visual identity that reflects your brand's personality and makes it memorable to your audience. From choosing colors and logos to designing promotional materials, we ensure that your identity is unique and strong, enhancing your distinctiveness.
services.testimonialsIntro: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our satisfied clients have to say about our services.
services.whyChooseUsDesc: Building tomorrow's technology solutions today with innovative approaches that blend creativity and cutting-edge technology.
services.fastDeliveryDesc: Quick turnaround times without compromising quality
services.secureSolutionsDesc: Enterprise-grade security in all our implementations
services.ctaReady: Ready to transform your business with innovative technology solutions? Get started today with our special pricing and expert consultation.
services.atLeastOneMessage: Please provide either a text message or a voice message.

whyChooseUs.costEfficiencyDescription: We deliver high-quality solutions at competitive prices, maximizing your ROI.
whyChooseUs.onDemandDescription: Our services are tailored to your unique business needs, ensuring flexibility and scalability.
whyChooseUs.itExpertsDescription: Our team consists of experienced professionals with deep technical expertise.
whyChooseUs.timeFlexibilityDescription: We adapt to your schedule and deliver your dreams on time, every time.
whyChooseUs.securePrivacyDescription: We prioritize your data security and privacy in every solution we build.

description.JavaScript: A powerful and flexible programming language used to develop dynamic and interactive web applications. It is the backbone of many platforms like YouTube and Google Docs.
description.HTML: The foundation upon which web pages are built, providing the basic structure for content on the internet. It is used in all sites like Wikipedia and LinkedIn.
description.CSS: Adds beauty and styling to web pages, making designs more attractive and smooth. It is used to enhance the interfaces of sites like Instagram and Airbnb.
description.React: A JavaScript library for building fast and efficient user interfaces. It is used by sites like Facebook and Netflix to deliver a unique user experience.
description.Next_js: A framework based on React that allows the creation of high-performance sites with server-side rendering and static page generation. It is used in sites like Vercel and TikTok.
description.Node_js: A runtime environment that enables the use of JavaScript on the server, ideal for scalable applications like PayPal and LinkedIn.
description.MongoDB: A NoSQL database used to store unstructured data efficiently. It is relied upon in applications like Uber and eBay.
description.Firebase: A comprehensive platform for app development that includes databases, authentication, and hosting. It is used by applications like Duolingo and Alibaba.
description.ReactNative: A framework for building native mobile applications using React, used to create applications like Instagram and Uber Eats.
description.MySQL: A reliable and powerful relational database management system, used in large sites like Twitter and WordPress.
description.Photoshop: The leading global image editing tool, used to create creative designs and famous brands like Nike and Coca-Cola.
description.Illustrator: A graphic design tool dedicated to creating logos and vector graphics. It is used by professionals in all creative fields.
description.SQLite: A lightweight embedded database engine, ideal for small applications like mobile systems.
description.TypeScript: A programming language based on JavaScript that adds type safety for large applications. It is used in developing enterprise solutions like Microsoft Teams.
description.Prisma: An ORM tool that simplifies database access, providing clear and easy-to-use APIs. It is used in modern and advanced applications.
description.Adobe_Xd: An advanced design tool for creating prototypes and user experiences. It is relied upon in designing large applications and websites.
description.Figma: A cloud-based collaborative design platform used to create designs and prototypes. It is relied upon by design teams at Slack and Zoom.
description.Sentry: A platform for monitoring and fixing errors in real time, used by large applications like GitHub and Airbnb to improve performance.
description.Twilio: A cloud communication service that facilitates the integration of text messaging and voice calls. It is used in platforms like WhatsApp and Lyft.
description.Shopify: An integrated platform for creating and managing e-commerce stores easily and professionally. It is used by global stores like Gymshark and Allbirds.

power.JavaScript: An indispensable language for web development, supporting the creation of innovative and responsive applications.
power.HTML: The backbone of every website, making content organized and easy to navigate.
power.CSS: Adds beauty and appeal to web pages, significantly enhancing the user experience.
power.React: Provides dynamic solutions for user interfaces, enhancing the speed and performance of applications.
power.Next_js: Makes sites ultra-fast and high-performing using the latest web technologies.
power.Node_js: Provides a reliable infrastructure for developing large and diverse server applications.
power.MongoDB: Allows flexible and scalable data storage.
power.Firebase: Helps speed up application development time with multiple integrated tools.
power.ReactNative: Combines the power of native applications with the ease of web development.
power.MySQL: Efficiently manages large amounts of data with stability.
power.Photoshop: Offers unlimited possibilities for high-quality creative designs.
power.Illustrator: Features precision and flexibility for creating innovative and unique designs.
power.SQLite: Provides fast and reliable data storage for small applications.
power.TypeScript: Enhances code safety and helps catch errors before execution.
power.Prisma: Simplifies working with databases in a modern and easy way.
power.Adobe_Xd: Provides comprehensive design tools for a unique user experience.
power.Figma: Supports real-time online collaboration for creating professional designs.
power.Sentry: Detects errors and improves application performance in real time.
power.Twilio: Provides innovative and advanced communication solutions for mobile and web applications.
power.Shopify: Helps store owners reach global markets with flexibility and speed.
